name: Bernard J. GOODHEART, Nelson A. Diaz, Joseph T. Labrum, Alexander Endy, David B. Smith and Thomas D. Watkins, and the Pennsylvania Conference of State Trial Judges, Appellants, v. The Honorable Robert P. CASEY, in his capacity as Governor of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, et al.

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and STOUT, JJ.
parties: Bernard J. GOODHEART, Nelson A. Diaz, Joseph T. Labrum, Alexander Endy, David B. Smith and Thomas D. Watkins, and the Pennsylvania Conference of State Trial Judges, Appellants, v. The Honorable Robert P. CASEY, in his capacity as Governor of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, et al.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order of Commonwealth Court affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Henry T. Reath, David K. Wanger, Philadelphia, for appellants.
Martin Kaufman, General Counsel, for amicus — The Pa. Economy League & The Comm. Foundation.
Susan J. Forney, John G. Knorr, III, Harrisburg, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
556 A.2d 835
Bernard J. GOODHEART, Nelson A. Diaz, Joseph T. Labrum, Alexander Endy, David B. Smith and Thomas D. Watkins, and the Pennsylvania Conference of State Trial Judges, Appellants, v. The Honorable Robert P. CASEY, in his capacity as Governor of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, et al.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 19, 1989.
Decided March 31, 1989.
Henry T. Reath, David K. Wanger, Philadelphia, for appellants.
Martin Kaufman, General Counsel, for amicus — The Pa. Economy League & The Comm. Foundation.
Susan J. Forney, John G. Knorr, III, Harrisburg, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and STOUT, JJ.
This decision was considered and rendered prior to March 7, 1989.
